A lightweight Linux distro designed to make web browsing bearable on ancient hardware.
Monitor basic sensor and other data on any Android device.
Python script that codes/decodes text based on a set letter to code value. For example A could become C or whatever you set it to be. Completely customizable.
Search for a movie or TV show and watch it for free, in high-quality, with subtitles and custom speed.
Simple Mirror's Edge x Half-Life keychain I made in Blender. Will post results here if I choose to 3D-print it later.
Designed some and stole some mouse cursors to put together the cursor pack I use on my computer. (The loading and move cursors are from a pack called "Posy's Cursor")
Need something found, programmed, graphic-designed? Send me a message!

Wallpaper pack for WinDynamicDesktop that changes from day to night mode based on current time. Took one of the wallpapers in the game files and made a night mode. To use download with the .json file and make sure to have WinDynamicDesktop installed.
